titleStmt.title: To the people at and about Stafford a testimony for God and his truth and against deceit and deceivers, especially the hireling priests ... / by ... Thomas Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Thomas, 1618-1682.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Dated and signed on p. 4 "In the year 79 [1679] T.T."; at end "In the year 1697 [i.e. 1679] T.T."
